Question: This person was born in Brooklyn, New York, to a Jewish family descended from Russian and Polish immigrants.
Hints: Kohs followed them for eight years and produced the film Song Sung Blue, but needed permission to use this person's songs.
In reality, this person had written and recorded these songs for himself, but the cover versions were released before his own.
Thus he told Bang, "...go with this person and I'll figure it out later".
